description: Bananas, rolled oats and carrots are the star players in these simple, tasty afternoon cookies. Plus, they're a nutritionally approved treat that the kids will love.
name: Healthier Carrot Oat Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat an oven to 210°C/190°C fan-forced. Grease and line 2 baking trays with baking paper.

Process bananas and carrots for 10 seconds or until the carrot is coarsely grated. Add remaining ingredients, except for the sultanas, and pulse until mixture just comes together. Transfer to a bowl. Fold in sultanas. Stand for 10 minutes.

Using damp hands and 2 tbs of mixture at a time, roll into balls, then place on prepared trays. Flatten slightly. Bake for 18 minutes or until the edges are golden. Remove from oven. Cool completely on trays.
